document_title: Stevens Johnson syndrome (SJS): Causes, signs, treatment
subsection_content:
Statistics show that groups of people susceptible to Steven-Johnson syndrome include:
Children; Adults under 30 years old/other groups of people; Old person; The rate of men with Steven-Johnson disease is higher than that of women; The child has an infection (such as pneumonia); Adults who are using one of the above medicines or other medicines
